CustomField.description: Calculates the churn amount when NET RACV is less than RACV Baseline or when Deal Lost
CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Deal Lost"),-RACV_Baseline__c, IF (Net_RACV__c - RACV_Baseline__c > 0, 0, Net_RACV__c - RACV_Baseline__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the churn amount when NET RACV is less than RACV Baseline or when Deal Lost
CustomField.label: Renewal Churn Amount
